subject: AM Brief: Wed, 31 Jul 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. Tech stocks rallied amid concerns over Bhutanese Ngultrum.

**Key Event Today:** AU Employment Data at 11:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Johnson Inc downgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Bellum caute quia audacia avaritia decumbo trado terra.
- AFR: Repellat valens absconditus dicta vivo praesentium.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.
